attr.title: Shell Out Showdown
attr.desc: A vending machine Rapid Fire Food Combat Generosity Arena! Throw food, dodge food, don't litter, and give to win in this hectic, platform combat arena free-for-all!
attr.inst: Purchase the game on itch.io (https://manadream.itch.io/shell-out-showdown), download, extract, and copy ShellOutShowdown.exe to the shelloutshowdown port folder. Altenatively, you can use the free demo files.
attr.inst_md: Purchase the game on [itch.io](https://manadream.itch.io/shell-out-showdown), download, extract, and copy `ShellOutShowdown.exe` to the `shelloutshowdown` port folder. Altenatively, you can use the free demo files.
